JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Are you a passionate baker ready for a new opportunity? Original Coffee are looking for a baker in the heart of Kødbyen, Copenhagen.
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you our new baker?

Original Coffee is a fast-growing company and therefore we need more talented people to join our team. We have 21 coffee shops based around in Copenhagen and our coffee shops invites our guests to find calm, focus, and connection with themselves and others.

At Original Coffee our mission is to create an experience from the moment our guests step into our coffee shops. The experience, which we call the ‘OC experience’, is defined by our exceptional coffee and great service – and delicious bread and pastry all key elements we consider important.

 

What will your role be?

As a baker at Original Coffee, you’ll play a key role in our bakery located in the heart of Kødbyen. Your tasks will include:

  • Preparing and baking our selection of bread, pastries, and other treats with a focus on quality and taste.
  • Ensuring that all baked goods meet our standards.
  • Working in a dynamic team where collaboration is important.

 

Who are we looking for?

We’re looking for someone who:

  • Is detail-oriented, and passionate about baking.
  • Can work independently but thrives as part of a team.
  • Has experience in baking—or a strong passion for the craft.
  • Is a morning person—our work starts early to ensure freshly baked goods are ready for our coffee shops.

 

What do we offer?

  • A central role in a growing team with plenty of room to develop your skills.
  • A creative environment where you can experiment and learn.
  • The opportunity to shape the taste experience at Original Coffee.

 

Our Culture

At our bakery, our culture is shaped by an international team. We communicate in English, value teamwork and diverse ideas, find inspiration in collaboration, and prioritize reducing food waste. Additionally, we enjoy listening to music as we work, creating a lively and enjoyable atmosphere.

If you’re ready to take your passion for baking to the next level and join the Original Coffee experience, please send us your application!

We look forward to hearing from you.

 

Please note that a valid work permit in Denmark is required, as we are unable to provide support for visa applications or related processes.
